name: Graveyard Shift (itch) (monkeychipz)
description: Throughout the game you play as a wanderer who has traveled too far.During his travels the wanderer stumbled into an enchanted graveyard that was created millions of years ago. It was said that the civilization that made the graveyard enchanted it so that it would resurrect all those who were buried in it. However, to keep them and rest of the world safe they created a barrier along with it which would trap all of those who entered it, never allowing  them to leave. Unfortunately for you, with no knowledge that the graveyard is enchanted with a barrier and that the zombies chasing you always come back to life, you will desperately try to fight for your life armed with nothing but a machine pistol, some med kits and high caliber bullets.
